tool.name: Summary Statistics
tool.help:
**What it does**
This module writes a report compiling useful information about the variation and genotypes present in the samples analyzed. It also includes calls and annotation summaries.
.. class:: warningmark
**TIP:** Although it can be called for any VCF file generated by the pipeline, this report is specially useful when a complete population has been processed and merged into a single annotated file.
-----
**Output format**
A text file with counts and statistical information divided in 6 sections::
Summary MAF Distributions Samples Genotyped Distributions SNP counts per sample INDEL counts per sample Other variants counts per sample
-----
.. class:: infomark
For details about this tool, please visit https://sourceforge.net/projects/ngsep/
